title: Spacious and Beautiful 1st Floor Studio w/nice view & walk-in Closet!
posting_body: ['Hi There!', 'Thank you for visiting our post!', 'Available now is a large studio apartment on the 2nd floor for only $1,550.00 per month with immediate move-in!', 'Apartment Features:', 'Large and welcoming space!', '- Beautiful hardwood floors', '- Full-size kitchen with granite counter tops', '- Updated appliances including an electric stove and full-size refrigerator', '- Spacious walk-in closets', '- Large windows offering lots of direct sun light', '- Full size bathroom with a tub and a window', 'Location: Ideal Location!', '- Located halfway between the 80/580 and UC Berkeley Campus', '- 4 blocks from the North Berkeley BART station', '- Steps away from the Ohlone Greenway bike path', '- Front door pickup/drop off of the 51B, Transbay, and FS buses', "- Trader Joe's, Berkeley Bowl, and Whole Foods all less than a mile away", '- Target is just a block from the apartment', '- Gas station across the street', '- East walk to various local restaurants', 'Parking Garage', '- Parking is $100/month in the garage when available', 'Other', '- Steam heat, trash collection, recycling, water and hot water are included.', 'Laundry', '- Coin-operated laundry machines are located downstairs', 'Lease', "- One-year, with first month's rent and a security deposit of $2,550.00 due at signing.", 'No Pet and No Smoking Policy', 'This is a very welcoming building, if you think you would be a great fit for you, feel free to send an email with a short bio to set up a viewing.', 'Have an amazing day!']
